description:
Located at 1095 Nimitzview Dr. in Cincinnati, Ohio, Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, has an additional law office in the city plus five more throughout Ohio and northern Kentucky from which we provide unmatched advocacy and support to individuals and families suffering needlessly as the result of medical malpractice, birth injuries, surgical errors, motor vehicle accidents, and other types of personal injury and wrongful death claims.

Regarded as one of our region's leading medical malpractice and personal injury law firms, we have recovered tens of millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients. We promise to do all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of finances you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages.

Honored for our impeccable professionalism and outstanding legal abilities, our attorneys have earned numerous top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America. We are also lifetime members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums, and we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo and the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys as well as many testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

This success is the direct result of our law firm's extensive legal knowledge and experience coupled with our unwavering commitment to help our clients achieve the justice they deserve. To begin the process for yourself and/or your family, you can contact Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, to receive a free evaluation of your claim. We also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
